record.title: EXTENDING DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA COLLEGE ACCESS ACT OF 1999
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1124, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Illinois (Mr. Davis) that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1124.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 342, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 342, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
